sell_warn.title: Sorry, but it seems we can’t trade with you right now :(

texts.description:
There could be several reasons for this. It might be a mistake or the result of Steam’s security
system acting on your account. The checklist below will help you figure out what might be
causing the issue. Please make sure that:

texts.title: You’re Signed In and Provided Trade Link is Valid
texts.description: Before you can start trading, ensure that you are signed in to your Steam account and have provided the correct trade link. You can check your link here: Steam Trade Offers

texts.title: Your Steam Account is Verified
texts.description:
Your account must not be limited. A limited account cannot send or receive trade offers. To
remove limitations, you need to spend at least $5 on Steam.

texts.title: Your Steam Guard is Enabled
texts.description:
Steam Guard must be enabled on your account for at least 15 days. This is Steam's two-factor
authentication system that secures your account. If Steam Guard has been disabled or recently
reactivated, you must wait 15 days before being able to trade or use trade links.

texts.title: Your Devices are Verified
texts.description:
If you recently logged into Steam from a new device or location, your account will be restricted
from trading for 7 days. Please wait for this restriction period to expire before attempting to
trade.

texts.title: Check Trade Hold Periods
texts.description:
Items purchased from the Steam Community Market or received via trade may be subject to a
7-day trade hold for your safety.

texts.title: Your Account Must Be at Least Level 5
texts.description:
For security reasons, your account must be at least level 5 to sell skins on our platform.
This requirement ensures the integrity and safety of transactions.
</br>You can learn more about Steam's rules, security, and trade restrictions through these links:

• ● Limited User Accounts
  • ● Trade and Market Restrictions
  • ● Steam Guard Setup
  • ● Item Holds

If you still need help or have confirmed that your account meets all the requirements above, feel free to reach out to our support team via the contact form on the "Contact" page or by email at info@csgostore.co.uk.
